title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - IBM: Building blocks to scale AI agents: hybrid, integrated, automated​(HMC104)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - IBM：构建可扩展AI代理的基础模块：混合、集成、自动化(HMC104)
abstract: Build a resilient, scalable architecture and power IT automation and integration for the agentic AI era. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 构建弹性、可扩展的架构，为智能体AI时代提供IT自动化和集成支持。本演示由AWS合作伙伴IBM为您呈现。
